title: Womens Dress
title_original: ZESLMG Womens Dickies Detachable Turtleneck Collar, Cotton Half Mock Turtlenecks

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #34,850 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #497 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck to be a thick, all-cotton garment that keeps neck warm in cold temperatures and is cozy during winter days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this
items.body: Comfortable and not too tight on neck. Made well and fabric is soft. Looks like picture. Half mock turtleneck that is just right (not too low are too high under chin). Read more
items.author: MJS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm dickies
items.body: Fantastic and fit great Read more
items.author: rosa maldonado

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish & Not too hot!
items.body: I get too hot wearing a Turtleneck under Sweaters or Sweatshirts. I decided to try this Dickey style Turtleneck. Glad I did-works beautifully. The size is great; no problems with it sliding up at all. I plan on getting a few more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Christel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but tight
items.body: Quality is thick and a little tight. Good for winter months on cold days! Read more
items.author: Halombuds

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars That it didnt fit ti tight.
items.body: The dickie did not fit tight. And that's good enough stretch and pull so it is not choking you Read more
items.author: Debbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just in case you might need to keep your neck warm
items.body: I was packing for a cruise that would include both hot and cold weather and didn't want to waste valuable packing space with a turtleneck base layer that would only be useful for a brief time -- if at all. Time was running short when I realized a turtleneck dickey was the solution. I found this 100% cotton, mock-turtleneck collar from ZESLMG on Amazon and it was delivered within a few days. Soft and comfortable and with just enough stretch to easily pull it over my head. Although it is described as a "mock" turtleneck, there is enough fabric to fold up or down based on how much coverage you want. Did the trick when I needed to bundle up for whale-watching excursions and did not want a scarf flapping in my face. Read more
items.author: Gerry L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted!
items.body: Comfortable and really great quality. I bought this to wear under crew neck sweaters so that my older looking turkey neck skin would be hidden. This is exactly what I wanted and at a great price. I'm going to buy it in other colors. Read more
items.author: Eliza Owens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice way to top off an outfit.
items.body: They are comfortable and just what is needed to go under sweaters. They were washed prior to wearing and have held their shape and color. I would recommend to others. Read more
items.author: Mary Jones

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown 1, 3 Pack,white + Black +Brown 1, Solid Black 1, 2 Pack,solid White + Solid Black 1, Solid White 1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
